successes.title: AGENT: The World's Smartest Watch
successes.description: The next generation smartwatch with brand-new technology. World-class developer tools, unparalleled battery life, Qi wireless charging.

Pledges.description: Help make AGENT a reality and keep up to date with exclusive backer updates. Thank you; every bit helps!
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (watch only): One AGENT smartwatch, minus the charger.  For backers who already have a Qi wireless charger (Lumia, Nexus, etc.).  Savings of $120 off estimated $249 MSRP.
DECEMBER AGENTS (watch only): One AGENT smartwatch, minus the charger.  For backers who already have a Qi wireless charger (Lumia, Nexus, etc.). Savings of $100 off estimated $249 MSRP.
JANUARY AGENTS (watch only): One AGENT smartwatch, minus the charger. For backers who already have a Qi wireless charger (Lumia, Nexus, etc.). Savings of $100 off estimated $249 MSRP.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (with charger): One AGENT smartwatch with Qi wireless charger.  Savings of $120 off estimated $299 MSRP.
DECEMBER AGENTS (with charger): One AGENT smartwatch with Qi wireless charger.  Savings of $100 off estimated $299 MSRP.
JANUARY AGENTS (with charger): One AGENT smartwatch with Qi wireless charger. Savings of $100 off estimated $299 MSRP.

BUILD YOUR OWN WATCH: Come spend the day with the founders of Secret Labs and House of Horology, watch circuit boards being built by robots, assemble your own watch.  Includes one AGENT smartwatch and Qi wireless charger.
